summary: The most valuable asset in the world is Gold with a market value of 11.85T.Apple follows Gold with a market value of 2.27T. In third place is Microsoft, which has a value of 1.84T.Bitcoin ranks 1 in the worlds most valuable assets with a market capitalization of 11.85T. Ethereum, another cryptocurrency on the list, ranks 2 with a market cap of 2.27T.
